Text:
Classification: Documentary
Genre: Cooking/Food | Fitness | Lifestyle
Status: New Series
Network: BBC TWO ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Thursdays at 09:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: June 14, 2012

The Men Who Made Us Fat is a documentary series which sees Jacques Peretti attempting to trace those who are responsible for revolutionising our eating habits, to find out how decisions made in America 40 years ago influence the way we eat today.

(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-31759)

John Yudkin's ultra-rare book "Pure, White and Deadly" is available here:

http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7359846/John_Yudkin_-_Pure__White_and_Deadly_(1972__Revised_1988_Edition

Can't wait for part 2 of the series!
